Un jeu qui ne devra SOUS AUCUN PRETEXTE ne pas figurer dans la biblioth√®que de chacun. Un pur chef-d'oeuvre d'un bout √† l'autre !

Szerintem egy zseni√°lis alkot√°s. Egyszer≈±en im√°dtam. Mindenk√©pp aj√°nlom hogy pr√≥b√°lj√°tok ki ketten is mert √≥ri√°si √©lm√©ny. Egy icipici probl√©ma: Nagyon nagyon nagyon r√∂vid. Voltak pontok ahol 1-1,5 √≥r√°t gondolkodtunk, de ha √ºgyes  az ember 6-7 √≥ra a single player √©s a coop.

Gameplay: Very open world. From terminal velocity, to super speed gels, to bouncing endlessly and....POTATOES!!

Graphics: This game provides incredibly detailed objects everywhere you step foot on. Like a futuristic simulation. This game is the definition of GOOD GRAPHICS!! Amazing Graphics Overall!!

Story: The story in Portal 2 is like the inner core of the entire game! The game‚Äôs  characters are efficacious with their personality, a fantastic sequel to the previous game, and the overall storyline was so great that it is indescribable!! The storyline in this game can really touch your emotions, from depression to anxiety to just plain happiness! :D Trust Me, you can‚Äôt let go of this game.

Controls: W,A,S,D,E,CTRL,SPACE (M1,M2) The legendary simple controls can take you so far!!

System Requirements: Runs very well with just 2gb ram and 1.5ghz. The requirements in portal 2 is very similar to half life 2. You can run it with a Potato!

Other features: This game contains stuff most games don‚Äôt. Like co-op, a chamber maker, a community workshop filled with thousands of amazing chambers, developer commentary, and so much more!! 


My Overall Rating: 9.9/10 
(There is absolutely no reason why you should dislike this game.) Portal 2 is a game where you have a portal gun. Simple right? Well... NOPE!! Valve took this idea to a whole new level, they created lovable characters with their own personalities, created an unforgettable storyline and there is just way to much things to say why you should get this game. Seriously, BUY IT!! I guarantee you will be very very happy with your purchase. 

Thanks for reading my review btw. xD

Resum√£o -> 9.5/10 / Cumpre um √≥timo papel em tudo 

Portal 2, uma continua√ß√£o do Portal. 
Um jogo de puzzle, com a mesma proposta do primeiro jogo. Bastante desafiador e criativo com suas fases, seus inimigos s√£o bastante carism√°ticos e inesquec√≠veis, a m√∫sica faz um √≥timo papel e √© marcante, a gameplay √© bem flu√≠da e seus puzzles s√£o desafiadores.

Creio que para quase qualquer pessoa, esse jogo ca√≠ra muito bem. Por√©m, ele ainda tem seus puzzles, que s√£o desafiantes mas n√£o imposs√≠veis (exceto em algumas partes que eu travava por completo). 

Em sumo, em todos os outros aspectos Portal 2 alcan√ßa com excel√™ncia, e n√£o √© atoa que √© um "cl√°ssico" por muitos! Ent√£o sim, vale a pena e tenho certeza que n√£o vai se arrepender 

Gameplay/Campanha - Poucas horas, mas cumpre seu papel bem (e ainda tem a coop)
M√∫sica - Marcante e √önica. Um show
Enredo - Continua√ß√£o do primeiro, misteriosa e interessante. (queremos o portal 3)
Multiplayer - V√°rios mapas na Workshop e Campanha Coop, sem reclamar

Conclus√£o : Vale muito a pena

Pros:
* Good puzzles that make you work out your brain
* Good story line
* Smart and funny dialogues, "I'm a potato!" is priceless!
* Great voice acting
* Decent graphics after all of these years!

Cons:
* Too easy, most of the puzzles do not pose much a challenge
* Too short, finished it on first play in approx. 14 hours

All in all, "Portal 2" is a fun game and it is well worth the money as long as it is on sale. I got it for 1.99 Euros and do not regret. Would be disappointed though if it was for the full price!

A bit more interesting than the first game, concept and gameplay remains the same.

Shoot portal, walk through portal, solve puzzle, yay..

Low replayability as solo, have not tried multiplayer.

So far this is my top favourite game. Usually I'm playing workshop coop maps with a friend of mine, and it's very easy to just go through a couple of maps at a time. I'm a very enthusiastic cooperative player and there's hardly a game out there that's more suitable than Portal 2.

Also, storyline is cool from what I can recall (both the cooperative storyline and the singleplayer).

You will be amazed by the highly enoyable levels. It really forces you to use your brains, the mechanics are amazing, and so is the story. If you have a good perception abilty of the space, then you would definitely enjoy it, if not, then you will develope some serious space perception skills after playing this. 10/10 experience!

I bought the game at 60 dollars on Xbox 360 when it first came out.
I got all achievements and was happy.
it was a 10/10 then.

Yesterday, I bought Portal 2 for PC and just finished the single player while getting every single player achievement in one sitting.
Still a 10/10.

I then went onto make my own puzzle, where I have to say I now am certain this game is an 11/10.
